derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (originally denoting protein from animal tissue): via French from Latin, literally 'glue'

entry.def: Gluten is a substance found in cereal grains such as wheat.

means.word_mean: 1. a protein substance that remains when starch is removed from cereal grains; gives cohesiveness to dough
